factText: Highway Overpasses are Deadly during #Tornadoes!. Madill 70 through town shut down from tornado damage. The way is shut.

The flash flooding has left at least 7 dead and 85 injured in the northern region of the country. Isolated low-lying areas could become flooded quickly resulting in dangerous driving conditions. This could lead to some downed trees/power lines as well as property damage, especially given the recent heavy rainfall and wet ground. Erin Wides reports from Onalaska and has video of storm damage, including flipped cars and roofs off of homes.

This storm system will impact the Gulf Coast and Southeast through Friday and will include tornadoes, strong winds, and lightning. 🌪️The potential for significant #hail, damaging #wind, and #tornadoes will continue throughout the Deep South through Thursday. New severe #WEATHER outbreak expected across South, including tornadoes https://t.co/vuMvOReHIu. Hundreds of #tornadoes have been reported across the eastern half of the US since April 1. This is looking like the next long-tracked significant tornado of the 2020 season.

Tornado Watch issued April 22 at 2:34PM CDT until April 22 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman OK Areas Affected: Marshall, OK; Johnston, OK; Carter, OK; Bryan, OK; Pontotoc, OK; Jefferson, OK; Murray, OK; Coal, OK; Stephens, OK; Garvin, OK; Atoka, OK; Love, OK; Hughes, OK THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE HAS ISSUED TORNADO WATCH 134 UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING WHICH REPLACES A PORTION OF SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 132.

A tornado watch has been issued for parts of Louisiana and Texas until 5 PM CDT https://t.co/sDuPiVH0eG. #Tornado #Warning has been issued for: East-central #Garvin, suthwest #Pontotoc, & north-central #Murray County in southern #Oklahoma, in effect until 5:00PM CDT.
**UPDATE** Once again due to the on again/off again severe weather the Pharmacy Drive Thru has temporarily suspended service. South Central Texa #Tornado Watch has been cancelled.

#Tornado #Watch (#4 today) has been issued for portions of: (eastern #Texas & northern and western #Louisiana), which is in effect until 12:00AM CDT. Tornado Watch is in effect for portions of southern #Oklahoma and north-central #Texas until 9 PM CDT. #Tornado #Watch (#3 today) has been issued for portions of: (southern #Oklahoma & north-central #Texas), which is in effect until 9:00PM CDT.

A large and very dangerous tornado has been confirmed according to the national weather service north of Onalaska and moving toward Corrigan and Seven Oaks, this is in Polk and Trinity Counties. MULTIPLE #tornadoes ongoing in Oklahoma and southeast TX!. A Severe Thunderstorm Warning has been issued for Allamakee County, IA un..  https://t.co/LFZLZidq4A

factText: Sadly, multiple fatalities have been confirmed from this tornado in Marshall County, OK. Multiple tornadoes have killed at least one person in Oklahoma Wednesday evening:. Death tolls are up to two from the madill tornado. Officials reporting at least two deaths caused by the tornado this afternoon. At least one fatality was reported Wednesday as tornado-warned storms made their way across southern Oklahoma. Marshall County officials confirm two people were killed in a tornado Wednesday evening.

The peak number of outages following the tornado has been 13,823 thus far. Take cover if you live in the path of this tornado warned storm!. Tornadoes further south and hoping everyone is OK. Multiple #tornadoes in your state tonight. 545pm - tornado being reported near Madill right now. We have now had a TDS on this tornado for 20 miles. The tornado damaged this business and several others nearby.

Judge Murphy has activated the Emergency Operations Center to support response activities. Emergency Services resources from outside the area are still trying to get to the town to assist the locals there. Mayor Bynum says Tulsa safer at home order remains in place until April 30th. Prayers to the residents and to all of the responding emergency teams. Meanwhile, Onalaska schools have since lost power and shelters have been set up at the local junior high and high schools.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_general_Are evacuation orders still in place or have they been lifted?

factText: EDITED AGAIN: Emergency Management is responding to the storm damage and has activated the command center in Onalaska, where County Judge Sydney Murphy is assessing the situation.
CITY Of about 8,000 TAKING DIRECT HIT BY THIS #MAJOR TORNADO. #MAJOR #TORNADO #DAMAGE SEEN ON #RADAR 7:30PM FROM #JASPER, #TEXAS.

More than 6,000 #homes and commercial #buildings were #damaged by #tornadoes and #storms in Southeast #Tennessee. -- At least 10 injuries have been reported in Onalaska after a massive tornado ripped through area, according to the Polk County Office of Emergency Management. Marshall County officials said two people died because of the tornado. Reports of heavy damage, people trapped.

Take shelter now if you’re in the path of this tornado. If you are under the tornado warning, please take shelter immediately!!!. ‪Madill Emergency Management is flying in KFOR-TV Chopper 4 now and confirms at least 2 deaths from the tornado that hit late Wednesday afternoon. If you are in the path of this dangerous storm, SEEK SHELTER NOW!!!. A large and extremely dangerous tornado is on the ground just east of Madill, Oklahoma Take shelter ⚠️⚠️⚠️

factText:
SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY. The Polk County Emergency Management has been activated with Onalaska Junior and Senior High Schools opening as shelters for residents in need. Seek Shelter now!. Those needing shelter, please head to Dunbar Gym in Livingston for shelter services. People near and south of Mill Creek should seek shelter now!. Seek shelter immediately! 

. Seek shelter now.

factText:
170 mph winds in the tornado. A "strong-to-intense tornado with potential peak wind of 130-165 (EF-2 to EF-3) occurred earlier today near Onalaska, Texas. At 4:55 pm CDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Madill, moving east at 20 mph. At 433 PM CDT, a confirmed #tornado was located just southwest of 
#Dougherty, moving east at 25 mph. At 457 PM CDT, a large and extremely dangerous tornado was located near Madill, moving east at 30 mph.

A tornado has been confirmed near the small town of Onalaska, #Texas by CC.

The Madill tornado resulted in two fatalities while the one in SE Texas caused multiple injuries.

Just over 5,000 customers in Bristow, Madill and Durant areas without power due to storms. Outage Update | April 22, 2020 | 8:00 PM Following the tornado that came through Marshall County, we are experiencing a large number of outages in the Madill area. We expect power to be restored in some areas by tomorrow. Initial reports from our crews indicate the tornado caused extreme damage to power lines.

Three members of TWFD have deployed as part of Texas A&M Task Force 1 to Onalaska in Polk County to assist in Search and Rescue operations after a tornado strike earlier this evening. Crews are on the scene.

The tornado threat is now over, but say a prayer for the people of Onalaska and Polk County as rescue efforts continue tonight. 5:00 PM - DAMAGING tornado continues and has just moved out of Madill, passing just east northeast of town.

Supercell still has strong rotation with active #tornado warnings over Tyler County Texas!. #Tornado warning in southern OK now for the storm near Springer. Many tornado warnings and an active tornado right now in Madill. ⚠️ THIS ALERT IS NO LONGER ACTIVE OR HAS BEEN SUPERSEDED BY ANOTHER ALERT ⚠️ Tornado Warning issued April 22 at 5:12PM CDT until April 22 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS SUMMARY:. PDS Tornado warning now in effect for the storm north of Onalaska, TX 

*

If you need assistance or shelter due to tornado damage, officials are in place at Onalaska Jr / Sr High and will provide transportation to shelters in Livingston. We are getting reports of widespread tornado damage in Onalaska, TX . please pray for everyone involved in the Search and Rescue efforts and also those effected by this storm. Prayers are needed there, because big tornadoes & weaker structures are not a good combination.

The deadly tornado touched down in Madill, Oklahoma, about 5 p.m. and damaged at least a dozen structures, the Oklahoma Department of Emergency Management says. Tornado touched down in Onalaska, north of Houston. Hey guys a tornado touched down in Madill, Oklahoma just 17 minutes southwest of Tishomingo !!!!  . Extremely large tornado that touched down just south of Trinity County early this evening.
